items.q: How do I upload photos to TV DocX Viewer?
items.a: You can upload photos using Web upload with a secure token, Wi-Fi upload when on the same network, or FTP upload. QR codes make connecting quick and easy.

items.q: Do I need to be on the same Wi-Fi network?
items.a: Not for web upload. The token-based web upload works even if your phone or PC is on a different network.

items.q: Can I show a clock on the screensaver?
items.a: Yes. You can fully customize the clock including position, size, format, seconds, shadow, and burn-in protection.

items.q: How do I activate it as my screensaver?
items.a: Use the Activate option inside the app to jump directly to Android TV‚Äôs screensaver settings.
